[[inst_lb]]
==== LB

*Syntax:* lb [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}><<<shamt>], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Load 8-bit signed byte from memory at effective address.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_lb.svg[LB encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/BASE_REG
